page.title: 14MEMORIES OF BRAINTREE
page.content: One day my family went for a walk past Courtaulds old Factory site.By the side there was a mound of grass. My dad asked me it I knew what it was. He told me it was an Airraid shelter. We went down in side. There were lots of cotten reels. It had a ladder up one end to see if it was safe to go back. It was dry and smaller than i imagined. On Courtaulds site there were three or four airraid shelters. The airraid shelter was an oval shape. There were more shelters on the site. One had been knocked down because it was falling in.
